A directX crash is related to your directX drivers, not your video card or League's coding. This is an issue stemming from other files out of League's control so this kind of issue is up to your to make sure your drivers are up to date. Make sure you've got the latest directX drivers installed (run the updates as admin to make sure they work) and try that in a *custom or practice match to avoid LPQ's while troubleshooting*.
